access_token.description: The value of the Access Token generated. See  https://go.estuary.dev/toHj38 for more information.
access_token.title: Access Token

start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Recharge API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.
start_date.title: Start Date

use_orders_deprecated_api.description: Define whether or not the `Orders` stream should use the deprecated `2021-01` API version, or use `2021-11`, otherwise.
use_orders_deprecated_api.title: Use `Orders` Deprecated API

resourceConfigSchema.description: ResourceConfig encodes a configured resource stream

namespace.description: Enclosing schema namespace of this resource
namespace.title: Namespace

syncMode.description: Sync this resource incrementally, or fully refresh it every run
syncMode.title: Sync Mode

resourceConfigSchema.title: ResourceConfig
